author: 登录; 注册
title: 华为Pura X真的适配好了吗 我看鸿蒙玩得挺嗨的-快科技-科技改变生活
text:
不出意外的话，这几天大家应该都被华为Pura X 给刷屏了吧？
前两天托尼也给大家聊了很多这机子的上手体验，文章发布以后，手机就被同事们抢过去用了，然后 ——
这个新形态手机，就被大伙儿“ 玩坏了 ”。
拿来当潮品拍照，当化妆镜补妆，这些都已经是基操了。
甚至真就有人拿这个 1:1 的外屏玩起了游戏，你还真别说，这小东西折起来一手握住，正好就能来一把开心消消乐。。。
还有一哥们还发现了一个系统新特性，像这样按住小导航条往右边滑动再停留，就能给 Pura X “ 减肥 ”。
其实是触发了 Pura X 这两天刚推的单手模式，把屏幕往握持的方向缩小靠拢，方便手小的用户操作。
当然也有不少同事表达了担忧，如果真的想买一个 Pura X 当主力机的话会不会有不方便的地方。
有这样的顾虑倒也正常，Pura X 除了是一个比例特殊的折叠屏之外，还是首款全面搭载 HarmonyOS 5 的手机。新形态遇上新系统，托尼一开始也担心真把 Pura X 当成主力机之后，会不会时不时就冒出一个小 bug 搞人心态。
在体验了更多应用之后，我发现我们的担心，都被预判了 —— 不管是华为自己的应用，还是第三方APP 个个都是老手了，碰上新形态和新系统都没翻大车，有的甚至玩得更花了。
别急，我们一个个来看。
华为自家的应用自然不必说，之前也给大家分享过了，华为阅读、音乐、视频等等都在第一时间内完成了新形态的适配。
前几天在小红书上爆火的这个卡片地图导航，托尼也替大家试了下。
之前 HarmonyOS 还只是把音乐播放器、视频播放器外卖软件做成了实况窗，没想到这次还玩了个大的，直接把一个城市地图也塞进了这小小的窗里。
这样在导航的时候，想要快速知道下一步往哪走就看小窗口，想知道自己现在走到哪了，就点一下打开 “ 中窗 ” ，不需要解锁进入手机还是很方便的。
当然像托尼这种方向感比较好的，还是会习惯把手机折起来，走一段之后实在拿不准往哪走再掏出来看一眼，外屏的尺寸用来看导航正好。
看来华子自己的应用大概率是可以放心了，那我们再来看看第三方应用。
一般来说，像是今日头条、新浪新闻这种内容类的 APP 会对屏幕尺寸的变化比较敏感。
好在这些内容类 APP 都没有在 Pura X 上出现页面布局混乱，或者字体图片显示模糊的问题。
而且该说不说，16 : 10 的比例拿在手里看内容，一行能够显示的内容更多，眼睛不用频繁地换行转动，好像确实舒服不少。
另一类影音类的 APP，就数 QQ 音乐玩得溜。QQ 音乐直接把之前广受好评的卡片逻辑给拿了过来，放在了外屏的适配上。
锁屏状态下，是个小卡，解锁进去之后是首页卡片，左划切到播放控制页面，再左划就是歌词页面。
另一个托尼日常用的比较多的影音类软件 B 站，就换了个思路，琢磨起了 Pura X 上的两块屏幕。
用外屏时，点开一个视频后画面会自动变成全屏。打开内屏，一个完整的视频播放界面就会流转回来。
而且这两天，还悄咪咪地更新了个新玩法 —— 把手机折到一半放在桌子上，就可以用外屏来看 B 站视频，相当于你拥有了一个自带支架的小播放器。
虽说这么小的屏幕长时间看不一定舒服，但是出门在外吃饭、撸串的时候临时充当一会儿下饭神器还是很舒服的。
我又试了下抖音也能这么玩。
要我说啥时候把华为阅读那个 AI 眼动翻页也拿过来那就更好了，这样刷抖音不靠自动连播也可以不动手了（狗头
扯远了，我们再来看一眼老朋友小红书，除了发布会上说的首页轻轻一捏，就能显示更多的帖子，再一拉又能放大变回之前的布局。
帖子里的内容显示也做调整，竖屏的时候，跟普通的直板手机一样，上面是图片下面是文字。
而只要将手机横过来，帖子就会自动分屏，变成跟平板一样，左边是图片右边是文字。
这样最大的好处就是，即使你只有一台手机，也可以得到两种不同的小红书体验。
普通的帖子可以直接竖屏，图片和文字分开看。
而像一些攻略和指南，就可以横过来分屏看，一半是图片一半是文字，不用看了一半文字又得滑上去对照图片，的确能省不少事儿。
像是 WPS、钉钉这些，看过我们以前文章的差友们应该都知道，它们都是适配鸿蒙急先锋了，这次托尼也给大家看了眼，也没有出现什幺蛾子，就不给大家一一展开了。
不过盘到这里，我们也产生了一个疑问：本来 HarmonyOS 的 APP 适配工作就已经足够紧张了，现在 Pura X 又整了个新的比例要适配，为啥 APP 们不但没有被新形态的适配问题所困扰，反而还能做出更多新的东西了呢？
对于 APP 开发者来说，不同屏幕比例的适配一直以来都算不上轻松。
我们跟安卓和苹果的一些开发者有过交流，大家都吐槽安卓和 iOS 的多比例屏幕适配难做。比如今年的 iPhone 16 Pro，虽然它的屏幕只比 15 Pro 大了一点点，但还是把微信里的字体给搞糊了。
为了搞清楚为啥 APP 们在新形态、新系统上都没有翻车反而玩得更花了，我专门联系了几个 HarmonyOS 的应用开发者。
其中悦览浏览器的开发者说，他们确实也有讨论过 HarmonyOS 应用在新形态的适配问题，但最终得到的结论就是，问题不大。
因为 HarmonyOS 非常新，所以刚推出 APP 开发规范的时候就考虑到了自适应 UI 框架的问题，虽然也要做一些手动调整，但是接口都是现成的，适配起来工作量没有想象中的大。
没想到在不同比例适配这事儿上， HarmonyOS 的年轻反而成了好事，考虑得全面也没那么多 “ 屎山 ”，减轻了开发者的适配负担。
没准也是因为不用在比例适配这样基础的事儿上耗费精力，开发者们才能解放双手，在 Pura X 上做出那么多新的玩法。
另外，这十多天用下来，我们并没有感觉到这些新的功能特别的突兀。好比前面说到的实况窗地图导航，这个功能新加进来之后，并没有与以前的音乐和视频播放实况窗产生冲突。
如果你是一边听歌一边步行导航的话，看导航的途中要切个歌的话，只要点一下导航就会很优雅地把 “ 中窗 ” 的位置让出来，给到音乐播放器。
这种功能变多却还是有序的爽感，可能真的只有高度强迫症才能 get 到吧。。。
要做到这么整齐划一，其实也没多困难。托尼到 HarmonyOS 的开发文档里瞄了一眼，发现这种多个实况窗并存交互的情况鸿蒙其实早就预料到了，也做好了准备 ——
开发文档里对实况窗的设计给出了非常清晰的规定，细到用户每一个应用场景，实况窗该显示什么内容都会有相应的模板。
像锁屏实况窗地图这种形式，并不需要应用自己从头开始折腾，把开发文档里给的文档模板拿过来用就好了。
不过开发文档里也明确指出，像是实况窗这种系统级的场景，应用们必须按照给定的设计原则，在规定的区域内显示，不能乱设计也不能乱放。
一旦 APP 被发现有违规行为，APP 的开发者就会收到处罚，并且必须在三个自然日内完成整改，否则就会被 “ 回收违规场景的实况窗通知权益 ”。
这其实也能理解，为了确保用户能够得到舒适优雅的体验，系统在给 APP 提供足够多的便利的同时，也要对 APP 开发者们的行为做好约束。
话又说回来，体验了这么多托尼也隐隐约约地能感觉到，不管是 Pura X 还是 HarmonyOS 5，它们做新形态的逻辑都是在现有基础和规则下，先确保用户用起来舒服，再去做加法。
也正是有了这样的逻辑加持，当变胖了的 Pura X 遇上新手村优秀代表 HarmonyOS 5 ，也没有翻大车，反而相互成就，带来了全新的体验。
随着 Pura X 逐步开售，会有更多的应用和服务加入鸿蒙，到那时候会有更多的应用开发者们摆脱束缚，为我们带来更多有趣好玩的新功能，HarmonyOS 也会越来越成熟。
反过来，Pura X 虽然目前仍有一些小问题，但是瑕不掩瑜。整体的体验也会随着 HarmonyOS 的逐步成熟，变得更加好玩好用，新形态的魅力也会进一步呈现。对于任何一个生态来说，终端和系统都是相辅相成的。
别的先不说，托尼我已经迫不及待想看到第一批拿到 Pura X 的用户们，拿着它开发出更多新的玩法，整出更多新活来了 。
差评

author: EFE
title: Wembanyama dice adiós a la temporada en la NBA por un coágulo sanguíneo en el hombro
text:
Baloncesto
Wembanyama dice adiós a la temporada en la NBA por un coágulo sanguíneo en el hombro
Los San Antonio Spurs informaron de que la trombosis venosa fue detectada tras el regreso del jugador del All-Star del pasado fin de semana
EFE
El pívot y estrella francesa de los San Antonio Spurs Victor Wembanyama se perderá el resto de la temporada de la NBA por un coágulo sanguíneo en el hombro derecho, según informó este jueves la franquicia texana.
Los Spurs indicaron que la trombosis venosa fue detectada tras el regreso de Wembanyama del All-Star, que se disputó el pasado fin de semana en San Francisco (California).
De acuerdo con ESPN, los Spurs creen que se trata de un "problema aislado" para Wembanyama, que fue elegido como número 1 del 'draft' de 2023, 'rookie' del año de la NBA en 2024 y que había sido llamado por primera vez para el All-Star.
El pívot francés promediaba esta temporada 24,3 puntos, 11 rebotes, 3,7 asistencias y 3,8 tapones por partido.
Con estos números, Wembanyama era el favorito para hacerse con el premio de defensor del año al final de la temporada regular.
Los Spurs, con la baja de Wembanyama, prácticamente se despiden de sus opciones de 'play-off', pues actualmente suman 23 victorias y 29 derrotas y son duodécimos en el Oeste.

author: @lanacionpy
title: La Nación / Comunidad se luce con la creación de imponente alfombra para celebrar el Corpus Christi
text: Como una manera de enaltecer la celebración católica del Corpus Christi, la cual tiene como objetivo conmemorar la presencia de Jesucristo en la Eucaristía, la comunidad alrededor del Obispado de las Fuerzas Armadas y la Policía Nacional realizaron una alfombra creativa en la que se pueden observar diferentes símbolos clave de esta ceremonia. “La alfombra la realizamos con todo lo que nos ofrece la naturaleza, tiene ramas, hojas, flores, arena y piedra, la intención es usar la creatividad para arar una alfombra especial por donde desfilará el Santísimo en medio de la celebración. Esta es una festividad muy impórtate para nosotros porque agradecemos también la presencia de Jesús en nuestra vida, acompañando a su pueblo”, indicó Nila de Ortega, una de las organizadoras en conversación con La Nación/Nación Media. La misma explicó que esta práctica ya lleva años dentro de la comunidad y que con cada realización van perfeccionando técnicas, logrando diseños cada vez más complejos con mayor cantidad de materiales naturales. [Podés leer: Milan cumplió 6 años y continúa conectado a la espera de un corazón](https://www.lanacion.com.py/pais/2024/06/01/milan-cumplio-6-anos-y-continua-conectado-a-la-espera-de-un-corazon/) “Se les convoca a los diferentes grupos de la parroquia y ellos se van organizando para poder recrear algún momento de la eucaristía. La creación de esta alfombra también es una manera de reunir a toda la comunidad en un espacio de preparación para la celebración del Corpus Christi y cada año tenemos mayor respuesta, en esta ocasión estuvimos entre aproximadamente 50 personas detrás de este montaje”, destacó Nila Ortega. Como miembro de la comunidad, Nila destacó que este es más allá de un trabajo creativo, es una manera de ofrendar y retribuir toda la gracia y bendiciones que los fieles reciben. La celebración eucarística está programada para mañana domingo a las 10:00 en la Vicaría Castrense. Datos clave. - Esta alfombra es confeccionada por aproximadamente 50 personas en total. - Se utilizan en su gran mayoría materiales provenientes de la naturaleza. - Es una manera de honrar las bendiciones que recibe la comunidad y mantenerla unida. [Lea también: Entre juegos, niños y adolescentes dijeron no al abuso y la explotación sexual](https://www.lanacion.com.py/pais/2024/06/01/entre-juegos-ninos-y-adolescentes-dijeron-no-al-abuso-y-la-explotacion-sexual/)

author: Mae Dolan
title: Act Global Celebrates 20 Years of Building Communities Through Synthetic Turf - Golf News Today - EIN Presswire
text: Act Global Celebrates 20 Years of Building Communities Through Synthetic Turf [EINPresswire.com](https://www.einpresswire.com/?promo=4700)/ -- AUSTIN, TX – Act Global, a global leader in synthetic turf solutions, marks two decades of excellence and innovation. Since 2004, Act Global has made significant strides in impacting communities worldwide, with thousands of installations in more than 90 countries, millions of gallons of water savings, and the development of inclusive recreational surfaces that cater to diverse needs. At the heart of Act Global's mission lies a commitment to enhancing performance and safety. Act Global has earned recognition as a supplier to multiple NFL teams (football), FIFA licensee (soccer), a FIH Preferred Supplier (field hockey), and a World Rugby Preferred Turf Producer. Multiple philanthropy and sustainability award accolades from the Synthetic Turf Council further validate Act Global's position as an industry social leader, as well. "We are so blessed to have been a part of such a wonderful industry that provides the most inclusive recreational surface for community use. Thank you to all our employees, partners, customers, and suppliers for being part of our last twenty years!" says John Baize, President of Act Global. As Act Global commemorates 20 years of progress, it reaffirms its commitment to creating solutions that address the challenges of today while paving the way for a sustainable future. Learn more about Act Global's contributions to community development, corporate social responsibility, and cutting-edge synthetic turf solutions by visiting [www.actglobal.com](http://www.actglobal.com). About Act Global: Act Global is based in Austin, Texas and is a part of the Beaulieu International Group (B.I.G.). Founded in 1959, B.I.G. employs over 4,900 people worldwide in 19 countries throughout Eurasia, America and Oceania and serves customers in 140 countries. In 2021, B.I.G. reported sales of €2.5 billion. Act Global operates its world-class manufacturing facilities in the U.S. and has serviced clients in more than 90 countries. Its experience includes multiple NFL football installations, a growing North American landscaping business, and patented aviation and landfill solutions. Mae Dolan Act Global +1 512.733.5300 [email us here](http://www.einpresswire.com/contact_author/692423193) Visit us on social media: [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@actglobal_) [Aviation & Aerospace Industry](http://www.einpresswire.com/channel/aviation-aerospace), [Conferences & Trade Fairs](http://www.einpresswire.com/channel/conferences-trade-fairs), [Education](http://www.einpresswire.com/channel/education), [Environment](http://www.einpresswire.com/channel/environment), [Sports, Fitness & Recreation](http://www.einpresswire.com/channel/sports-fitness-recreation) EIN Presswire does not exercise editorial control over third-party content provided, uploaded, published, or distributed by users of EIN Presswire. We are a distributor, not a publisher, of 3rd party content. Such content may contain the views, opinions, statements, offers, and other material of the respective users, suppliers, participants, or authors. author: Munima Sultana
title: Mithamoin elevated expressway project to be axed | The Financial Express
text:
Published :
Updated :
The controversial project to construct 15 kilometres of elevated road in the haor area of Kishoreganj's Mithamoin upazila will be cancelled as part of the interim government's move to cut costs and to protect the environment.
The Tk 56.5 billion project, taken by the previous Awami League government because of the wish of party leader and former president Mohammad Abdul Hamid, faced criticism amid severe flash floods that hit the haor area after inaugurating the Mithamoin-Austagram road.
The 47km road was constructed at grade. Some channels were kept open for the haor water to cross, which caused severe flash floods in the area after the road's opening in 2019.
Officials said the process has already started to cancel the project, which had been approved at the Executive Committee of the National Economic Council (ECNEC) meeting on January 18, 2023.
Though Bangladesh Bridge Authority (BBA) has already released Tk 3.0 billion to acquire land for the project, it said the fund would be withdrawn as the acquisition process is yet to start.
Sources said BBA would make the move according to the rail and road transport adviser Muhammad Fouzul Kabir Khan's direction given after a meeting in the last week of April.
BBA has already spent a handsome amount on building the project office.
Bridges Secretary Mohammad Abdur Rouf during a meeting with the Reporters for Rail and Road members said the decision to cancel the project was made considering its bad impacts on the environment and the haor area's biodiversity.
He also said the released land acquisition fund would be taken back.
The Mithamoin Elevated Expressway project was planned to establish road communication in the haor region from Mithamoin headquarters to Karimganj upazila, connecting the Mithamoin Cantonment.
smunima@yahoo.com

author: @c_arnold01
title: Cops respond to 'assault in progress' involving Tyreek Hill as wife files for divorce
text:
Police were called to a domestic disturbance involving Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill and his wife Keeta Hill at the couple’s condominium in Sunny Isles Beach, Florida after Keeta’s mother made a call to authorities because she feared for her daughter’s safety.
The incident occurred on Monday and officers from the Sunny Isles Beach Police Department arrived just before 2 p.m., according to a police report obtained by Local 10 News.
Police were responding to a call of an “assault in progress,” according to the report, and Keeta’s mother, Alesia Vaccaro, described Hill as being “very aggressive and impulsive” when she spoke with responding officers.
5 Tyreek Hill (l.) and wife Keeta (r.) at an EA Sports event in New Orleans on Feb. 7, 2025. Getty Images 5 Tyreek Hill (r.) and wife Keeta (l.) in February 2024. Getty Images Vaccaro also told authorities that she had witnessed Hill throw a laptop on the floor and grab the couple’s daughter before walking toward the balcony of the condo after Hill and Keeta had been arguing.
Hill told officers that the pair had started arguing after he returned from training and the two were discussing therapy, which saw things quickly escalate.
The football star had admitted to police that he grabbed the baby, but contested that “I have the same rights as a father as her as a mother, and I can take my baby whenever I want,” the report stated.
5 Tyreek Hill’s wife Keeta. Instagram/keeta_vaccaro Keeta had told officers that the pair had been fighting more frequently and that he would get upset whenever she gave her opinion, and she stated that “he becomes angry and throws objects around.”
She also told officers that she was “in the process of filing for a divorce,” the report stated.
The Post confirmed she filed for a dissolution of marriage with children on Tuesday in Miami-Dade County Family Court
Both Hill and Keeta denied things had gotten physical, but police did observe a bruise on Keeta’s upper chest, which she told them could have happened unintentionally when Hill grabbed the baby from her.
Keeta declined to provide a written statement and Hill left the condo without any arrests being made.
5 Tyreek Hill’s wife Keeta with their daughter, Capri. Instagram/keeta_vaccaro “On Monday, we were informed that the police were called to Tyreek Hill’s home, and after conversations with Tyreek and members of his family, the police departed the residence without further incident and the case was closed,” the Dolphins said in a statement. “We have since been in communication with Tyreek and the NFL and will have no further comment on the matter.”
This is the latest off-field incident involving Hill.
The star receiver is being sued by OnlyFans model Sophie Hall for injuring her leg in 2023 during a backyard football lesson.
5 Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill. Diamond Images/Getty Images Hill was also involved in a chaotic scene during a traffic stop just outside Hard Rock Stadium as he was driving to the Dolphins’ opener, which resulted in him getting handcuffed before he played in the game.
The couple themselves also had a bizarre instance where a divorce filing had been made on Hill’s behalf that he disputed and later fired his lawyer over.
And the Monday incident was not the first time police had been called regarding a domestic dispute between Hill and Keeta, with authorities in Davie, Florida, responding to a similar call back on Jan. 22, 2024.
Hill and Keeta got married in November 2023 .

author: Alan Friedman
title: Google Maps helps thieves find their next target but you can stop them from making you a victim
text: Google Maps is a great app and website because, in addition to telling you how to get from "A" to "B" quickly and safely, the app will show you where to dine once you get to "B." You'll also be told where you can find entertainment in "B," where the best hotels are, and even given directions to the spot with the best cup of Joe in the city. Yes, there is something for everyone in the Google Maps app which is why it is one of the most popular and widely used apps in the world. Google Maps and the integrated Street Views feature can be used by thieves to help plan the break-in of a home One thing that Google won't tell you, being such a humble company and all, is that Google Maps is of value to thieves as well. That's because thanks to Google Maps, the homes that we live in and the cars we drive (and even the look of your face) can be viewed by anyone at any time by someone with the app or website. "Our very homes we live in, the vehicles we drive, the locations we stay are available to anyone around the globe."-Daniel Linskey, security analyst Security analyst Daniel Linskey says that organized criminals are using Google Street View to look for their next targets . With the images of homes on Street View blown up, these thieves are trying to analyze the value of the properties they are looking at. They are also looking to see how they can get into a property fast and out just as quickly. Street View used to have a dedicated app on iOS and Android but it is now integrated into Google Maps.Criminals are also using the zoomed-in images of homes on Street View in Google Maps to ascertain if a home has a front-door camera or an elaborate exterior security system. Security analyst Linskey said, "Technology is getting better and better, and criminals are using technology to get better and better." But there is a way that you can blur the image of your home in Street View in Google Maps.You'll have to use the desktop version of Google Maps since this blurring feature is not available on either the iOS or Android app. So the first thing you have to do is open the Google Maps website at GoogleMaps.com. Navigate to your home address and a drop-down menu appears on the screen. Tap on the Street View image and you'll see a black box with three vertical white dots. Press on the dots and it opens a menu that includes "Report a problem." Tap on it. With the desktop version of Google Maps, you can blur the image of your home, face, or car Keep in mind that once a property is blurred, the change is permanent. Security Analyst Linskey suggests that you also blur the interior of your homes if they appear on websites such as Redfin and Zillow. We'd probably be surprised at the number of thioeves who use those websites to help them checkout a potential target in advance. Take a few minutes to request that your home, face, or car get blurred on the Street View integration in Google Maps. Taking the few minutes it will cost you to follow the directions in this article can end up saving you money and could potentially keep you from being caught up in a home robbery attempt. Not only could you save your property from getting ripped off, you might end up saving yourself from receiving bodily harm. Loading Comments...

author: @WJHG_TV
title: Jackson County Sheriff's Office receives Kevlar helmet donation from Leon County Sheriff's Office
text: Jackson County Sheriff's Office receives Kevlar helmet donation from Leon County Sheriff's Office JACKSON COUNTY, Fla. (WJHG/WECP) -Jackson County Sheriff Donnie Edenfield was in Leon County on Wednesday picking up some vital equipment. “We received 70 ballistic helmets that were donated from the Leon County Sheriff’s Office to our agency,” Edenfield said. He says the helmets are made with the same material that goes into bullet-proof vests. “In an active shooter situation, you know there’s a good chance you could encounter gunfire, now we’ll be able to send that deputy in with a Level-3 Kevlar helmet,” Edenfield said. Sheriff Edenfield says that his office is truly grateful, and that Leon County’s generosity is a testament to the network of sheriffs in Florida. “That’s the benefit of the Sheriff’s Association, is having that relationship with all the sheriffs throughout the state,” said Edenfield. He says that network is used by larger counties to help out some of the smaller ones. “Anytime that a sheriff has something in excess that they’re not using, often times they will offer up the equipment or the resources to other sheriffs that may be in need,” Edenfield said. The helmet donation is an example of how sheriffs across Florida have each other’s backs. “It’s the tightest group that I’ve ever been a part of, by far. Sheriffs are always gonna look out for sheriffs,” said Edenfield. Copyright 2023 WJHG. All rights reserved.
